en.t2: TuGraph is a graph database product independently developed by Ant Group. Its main features are a single machine with large data volume, high throughput, and flexible API, while supporting efficient online transaction processing (OLTP) and online analytical processing (OLAP). LightGraph is the former name of TuGraph.
en.t6: Full ACID support with serializable transactions
en.t13: Efficient development of new graph algorithms with Traversal API
en.t18: Up to 10 million vertices per second
en.t24: TuGraph uses authorization files for commercial authorization. If you need to use or purchase a new license, please contact us: tugraph@service.alipay.com

zh.t2: TuGraph 是蚂蚁集团自主研发的图数据库产品。其主要特点是单机大数据量，高吞吐率，以及灵活的 API，同时支持高效的在线事务处理（OLTP）和在线分析处理（OLAP）。 LightGraph是TuGraph的曾用名。
zh.t8: 基于web客户端的图可视化工具
zh.t13: 适用于高效图算法开发的Traversal API
zh.t16: 性能及可扩展性特征包括：
zh.t18: 千万顶点/秒的高吞吐率
zh.t24: TuGraph使用授权文件进行商业授权。如果您需要使用或购买新的授权，请与我们联系：tugraph@service.alipay.com
